name: Ice Cavern
longDesc: Ice covers every surface. In an alcove cut into the west wall there is a small shelf, on the shelf there is a blue glass bottle. Below, stacked on the floor, are several large ice blocks. To the east, a cold river runs North - South. Large ice blocks, just like the ones stacked under the alcove, occasionally flow downstream.
shortDesc: There is a small shelf with a blue bottle, on the wall are several large ice blocks. To the east is a river.
